content: Web search: Supabase pgvector best practices + OpenAI embeddings + pdfplumber tips
Call integration playbook agent for OpenAI embeddings integration
Set up Supabase resources: bucket 'pdfs' + tables (pdf_documents, pdf_chunks) + pgvector extension
Install backend dependencies: pdfplumber, supabase-py, openai
Create comprehensive POC script that combines all functionality: PDF upload, text extraction, chunking, embeddings, and storage
